Text: Glad I could help. Let me know how it works out.  Like I said in the description, I did a lot of testing on it before uploading it. I decided to do this since I have never been able to find a setup that works well for GTA 3 and VC.  My setup I find works really well. Looking forward to some feedback, thanks guys.
